page.title: 20Conclusion-about the Project
page.content: The B.B.C.{Domesday Project}has been very worthwhile according to all the children who took part in collecting the data for the survey. Most of the surveyors enjoyed the time they spent talking to people about the area today. Most enjoyable seemed to be talking to the older generation about how times have changed in the past sixty years. Also the project has given them the chance to talk to adults in a different way than they sometimes do: it has given them an opportunity to talk to them in an "adult" way and they have learnt the importance of asking serious and structured questions. The project has also made the participants more aware of some of the issues that affect their community today.
